data.system_settings: iPhone 8 Plus, iPad Air 2 - iOS 12 Public Beta 10
data.actual_result: The linebreak is not shown, the 2 lines are shown in one line without any space.
data.expected_result: The linebreak between the different lines should be shown.
data.short_description: Linebreaks not shown when there are at least 2 spaces before it
data.steps_to_repro: - Write a message with the following conditions - First any text (e.g. `Test`) - Then at least 2 spaces in the same line - Now add a line break by clicking return - Add another text (e.g. `Test 2`) - Send the message
